Detailed Description

Specialization of FlockBase class. Implement the enemy flock behavior.

Author:
Bernardino Frola
This class manage the enemy flock behavior. This type of flock attack the playership when its enters into the enemy flock territory.

This method is used from class specialization for implement the custimized behavior

Member Data Documentation

Vector3 FlockEnemySoldier::mBasePosition [protected]

Initial position of the flock. Using this parameter the enemy flock cannot exit from its range.

Max distance allowed from the FlockEnemySoldier::mBasePosition
